cardOne.title: Pick Your Meals
cardOne.paragraph: A new menu of 30+ dietitian-designed options every week.

cardTwo.title: Cooked to Perfection
cardTwo.paragraph: Our gourmet chefs do the prep, so you can do you.

cardThree.title: Heat, Eat & Enjoy
cardThree.paragraph: No prep. No mess. Our meals arrive ready to heat and eat in minutes.

listOne.paragraph: We only use premium ingredients from our network of trusted partners. All meals are Chef-prepared and Dietitian-approved.

listTwo.paragraph: We only use premium ingredients from our network of trusted partners. All meals are Chef-prepared and Dietitian-approved.

listThree.paragraph: We only use premium ingredients from our network of trusted partners. All meals are Chef-prepared and Dietitian-approved.

ExploreTheMenu.title: Explore the Menu
ExploreTheMenu.paragraph: Browse the 35 gourmet meals featured on this week’s menu.

DeliveryServicePlate.title: Iraq's #1 Ready-to-Eat Meal Delivery Service
DeliveryServicePlate.paragraph: Choose from a full menu of 35+ weekly meals and 55+ add-ons, including snacks, smoothies, and more.

col1.paragraph: Choose from a full menu of 35+ weekly meals and 55+ add-ons, including snacks, smoothies, and more.

OurPlans.headingDescription: No commitments, except to yourself. You can pause, cancel or change your plan at any time.
OurPlans.leftDescription: Your preferences will help us show you the most relevant meals first. You will still have access to all the meals each week.

errorMsg.error1: Please select gender and enter age before proceeding.
errorMsg.error2: Please enter weight and height before proceeding.
errorMsg.error4: Please select diet goal before proceeding.
errorMsg.error5: Please select body type before proceeding.
errorMsg.error6: Fat percentage must be greater than or equal to 5

macroClc.paragraphTxt: In just a few minutes you can calculate the exact number of carbs, fat, and protein you should eat each day. Whether you are looking to lose weight or build muscle, finding foods that fit your macros can help you achieve your fitness goals faster!

label.title: ALF1
label.text: sedentary desk job – little or no exercise

label5.title: ALF5
label5.text: very active intense exercise – 11+ hour/week with cardio

label6.title: ALF5
label6.text: extra active – 12+ hour/week with cardio and physical job

ketoMacroClc.paragraphTxt: In just a few minutes you can calculate the exact number of carbs, fat, and protein you should eat each day to achieve ketosis and reach your goals on a keto diet.

label.title: ALF1
label.text: sedentary desk job – little or no exercise

label5.title: ALF5
label5.text: very active intense exercise – 11+ hour/week with cardio

label6.title: ALF5
label6.text: extra active – 12+ hour/week with cardio and physical job

NutritionCoaching.paragraphTxt: Chat with a Registered Dietitian today for free!
NutritionCoaching.paragraphTxt1: Whether you're looking to set nutrition-related goals or need  help choosing the best Factor meals for you, our team of registered dietitians is here to help!
NutritionCoaching.paragraphTxt2: At the time of the coaching session, your dietitian will be calling you via phone or online meeting. Please ensure the your phone's spam settings allow for this call.
NutritionCoaching.paragraphTxt3: Please note, this service is only available to customers in the Iran.
